overview:
Danny is the Founder and Chief Executive Officer of eVisibility and spend most of my day working on the companyâ€™s position as the leading innovator of customized Internet marketing strategies dedicated to delivering verifiable results to clients.

He has created, marketed and sold several successful health, e-commerce and Internet marketing companies over the past 10 years and now works exclusively on state-of-the-art e business strategies for clients such as McDonalds, Fidelity, 24 Hour Fitness, Jitterbug, Artes Medical, Prudential, Lamps Plus and many more.
